name: Best Unsteamed Shrimp
author: Alice Hvidsten
summary: A perfect everytime recipe for steamed shrimp with no water!  I've been using this recipe for years and it's always perfect! Enjoy!
ingredients: 2 pounds large shrimp - peeled and deveined
¼ cup Old Bay Seasoning TM
directions: Place butter in microwave safe bowl
Place bowl in microwave and melt butter (15 to 30 seconds on high)
Coat microwave safe pan with non-stick cooking spray
Arrange shrimp in a layer in the pan
Pour butter mixture evenly over shrimp
Cook in microwave on high power for 6 minutes
After two minutes have elapsed pause microwave and rearrange shrimp (move shrimp for the center to the outside, from the outside to the center)
Let the shrimp cook another 2 minutes
When 4 minutes have elapsed pause the microwave again, rearrange the shrimp once more
Place shrimp back in the microwave and cook remaining two minutes
Serve hot with your favorite cocktail sauce
